step1.howItWorksInfo: Just upload your work schedule, select yourself and we'll generate events in google calendar for you.
step1.dragAndDropInfo: Drag and drop or click to select your work schedule (.xlsx)
step1.dragAndDropChangeInfo: Drag and drop or click to change your work schedule (.xlsx)
